name: Berger & Argenti - Entubar Maduro - Corona Macho
additionalNotes: The Berger & Argenti Entubar Maduro is rolled by using the entubado method, where the filler tobaccos are rolled into long cylindrical tubes. This method results in creating a well-constructed cigar with an excellent draw. A full-strength cigar the Berger & Argenti Entubar Maduro features a Mexican San Andrés wrapper with a Nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos from Nicaragua and the Dominican Republic. Perfectly balanced, the Berger & Argenti Entubar Maduro provides a flavor profile that can be best described as creamy, toasty, nutty and a little spicy.
